subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Sam Holman started making maple baseball bats in his garage in Ottawa 10 years ago because he was trying to win a bar challenge. Now he’s trying to sell his business for $3.5 million on eBay.
snippet: Sam Holman started making maple baseball bats in his garage in Ottawa 10 years ago because he was trying to win a bar challenge. Now he’s trying to sell his business for $3.5 million on eBay.
